name: Giant Eagle
languages: Giant Eagle, understands Common and Auran but can't speak

special_abilities.name: Keen Sight.
descriptions: The eagle has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The eagle makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

actions.name: Beak.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
